content: Is there anything special I need to do to cause a new draft IG in the HL7 org (https://github.com/HL7/fhir-patient-correction) to be included in the CI build process? I've been watching https://fhir.github.io/auto-ig-builder/builds.html since my commit an hour or so ago, but not seeing anything yet.
Have you added a webhook in the git repo? https://github.com/FHIR/auto-ig-builder/blob/master/README.md
I have not -- thank you @Sarah Gaunt !
